cmput301.f13t01.model

Interface Media<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Image, ImageUri, Sound, Text, Video

    public interface Media<T>
    The Media interface is an interface which must be implemented by any classes that will be used as media types inside a Fragment. The interface takes a generic type argument which defines the type of content stored inside the media type.
    Version:
    1.0, 28/10/13
    Author:
    Jesse Huard

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Returns the content of the media type.

      Gets the MediaInteractionManager of the media type.

      Sets the content of the media type.
